member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.OneWayMultiValueConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value. Used in data binding. Override this method (sealed).
member.param: The array of values that the source bindings in the MultiBinding produces
The type of the binding target property
The culture to use in the converter
member.returns: A converted value

member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.OneWayMultiValueConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Unimplemented method for converting back. This converter can only be used for one-way binding.
member.returns: Always throws an exception

member.summary: Compares 2 months together
member.param: The currently view month and the other month to check
member.returns: Returns true if there is a match between the 2 months

member.summary: converter to calculate the size for the cell of the calender

member.name: T:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.OneWayValueConverter
member.summary: Base class for value converters that do not implement the ConvertBack method.

member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.OneWayValueConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a value. Used in data binding. Override this method (sealed). Decorate the method with the type of return data (ValueConversion attribute).
member.param: The value produced by the binding source
The type of the binding target property
The culture to use in the converter
member.returns: A converted value

member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.OneWayValueConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Unimplemented method for converting back. This converter can only be used for one-way binding.
member.returns: Always throws an exception

member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Controls.CellSizeConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converter for the calender control to measure the widths to calculate
member.param: Pass the Actual width of the parent control
Pass widthCell to calculate the width a particular cell. Pass widthCellContainer to calculate the witdth of the parent control
member.returns: Returns the new width to use

member.name: T:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Controls.DataGridView
member.summary: DataGridView is a control that can display a list of objects The data grid view show the data in a grid style. It generates the columns from the properties of the object in the current context of data You can use the DataGridViewPropertyDescriptorAttribute attribute to make your class properties interact better with the data grid

member.name: M:AC.AvalonControlsLibrary.Core.MathUtil.IncrementDecrementNumber(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates the string passed by parsing it as int and checking if it is inside the bounds specified then the resulting int will be incremented/decremented
member.param: The string to parse as int and increment/decrement
The min value for the bound checking
The max value for the bounds checking
Pass true to increment and false to decrement
member.returns: Returns the new number incremented or decremeneted

The min value for the bound checking
The max value for the bound checking
member.returns: Returns the int that was constructed from the string + bound checking
